verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
I will enter His gates
with thanksgiving in my heart
I will enter His courts with praise
I will say this is the day
that the LORD has made
I will rejoice for He has made me glad

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He has made me glad
He has made me glad
I will rejoice for He has made me glad
(Repeat)

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We will enter His gates
with thanksgiving in our hearts
We will enter His courts with praise
We will say this is the day
that the LORD has made
We will rejoice for He has made us glad

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He has made us glad
He has made us glad
we will rejoice for He has made us glad
(Repeat)
